Stress and displacement checks under full/empty load cycles

scope_highlights.title: Seismic Load Analysis (ASCE 7)
details: Dynamic response and vibration mode assessment
Verification of safe structural performance during seismic events

scope_highlights.title: Deflection & Stability Analysis
details: Drift limits validation for combined loads

scope_highlights.title: CFD Simulation – Pneumatic Conveying System
details: Pressure field simulation along conveying pipeline
Pressure drop and flow velocity analysis
Verification of uniform and stable conveying behavior

scope_highlights.title: CFD Simulation – Aeration Pad Air System
details: Flow balancing to ensure uniform aeration

scope_highlights.title: Mechanical & Structural Detailing
details: General arrangements for silos and support structures
Fabrication drawings for shell, platforms, stairs, ladders
Anchor bolt plans and structural steel connections

GA drawings, fabrication drawings & layout plans
